summary: April 21 is the 111th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Paul Geremia  is an American blues singer and acoustic guitarist.
Geremia recorded his first album in 1968, having been significantly influenced by both the rural blues tradition and the folk music revival of the 1960s. Geremia has never recorded with electric guitar, hewing steadfastly to a traditional ethic with his acoustic playing.
title: Paul Geremia
